servinfo.title: Engine General Information
servinfo.ptxt: The engine is a water-cooled, 60° V6 cylinders, 4 stroke cycle gasoline unit with its DOHC (Double over head camshaft) valve mechanism arranged for “V” type valve configuration. The double overhead camshaft is mounted over the cylinder head; it is driven from crankshaft through timing chains, and no push rods are provided in the valve train system.
